Title: Prohibits licensees from relying on artificial intelligence for tracking and advertisement purposes
Summary: Prohibits licensees from relying on artificial intelligence for tracking and advertisement purposes and using such artificial intelligence to create personalized advertisements.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to using artificial intelligence to personalize advertisements on mobile sports wagering
